title: Onboard a New Customer Account
description: A new customer has placed their first order. An account manager needs to set up their full account profile.

tasks.description: Create a new customer account record in the CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the main account record.

tasks.description: Enter all required information, including billing address, shipping addresses, and primary contact details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates all the necessary fields in the CRM.

tasks.description: Set the customer's payment terms and credit limit as approved by finance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the financial details for the new account.
